text: mūsā tanṟe janatayēāṭ paṟañña sandarbhaṁ (śrad'dhēyamāṇ‌.) niṅṅaḷkk kaṭutta śikṣa āsvadippikkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe āṇmakkaḷe aṟukeālanaṭattukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe peṇṇuṅṅaḷe jīvikkān viṭukayuṁ ceytukeāṇṭirunna phir'auninṟe kūṭṭaril ninn niṅṅaḷe rakṣappeṭuttiya sandarbhattil allāhu niṅṅaḷkku ceyta anugrahaṁ niṅṅaḷ ōrm'mikkuka. atil niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal ninnuḷḷa vampicca parīkṣaṇamuṇṭ‌
